usage.cn: 为成就大事，我们需要的不只是行动，还要梦想，不只是计划，还要相信。–——Anatole France
usage.eng: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe."

usage.cn: 世界并不在意个人自尊。自我陶醉前，它冀望你能先有所成就。
usage.eng: The world won't care about your self-esteem. The world will expect you to accomplish something before you feel good about yourself.
